name: Survive the show - survival inception game
name_original: Survive the show - survival inception game
description:
An "Inception survival game" prototype, you are inside a live survival show. With the help of other participants, you´ll figure out how to live in the show´s world. Some objects/BGM/SFX/UI are not final.

World is created procedurally.

You also can use Xbox controller to play:

[F] or Y - Collect/Create (npc)

[R] or X - Talk (npc)

Hold [Shift]/Y to run

[Q]/[E] or RB/RT - Switch weapons/menus

Mouse scroll / Dpad - Zoom in/out

RMB or A - Use item/accept

RMB or B - Remove item/cancel

[I] or Menu - Inventory

[M] or View - Map

Click [SPACEBAR]/Y to "dodge" (the character is not good at it at the beginning

For now you basically collect resources and build walls, bed and fire, progress a little on the story and unlock the OP Xchanger.

You can talk to the other participants with different skill to help you out.

One enemy that appears at night is available but you can´t fight back yet.
